mapper.select: SELECT S1.PD_CD , S3.SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL AS SAP_MAT_EVL_CLSS_VAL /*SAP자재평가클래스*/ , S3.SAP_MAT_CD /*SAP자재코드*/ FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS S1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_REL S2 ON S1.PD_CD =S2.BASE_PD_CD AND S2.PD_REL_TP_CD ='05' /* 기준상품 - 제품 */ AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS S3 ON S2.OJ_PD_CD = S3.PD_CD AND S3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_GBCO_SAP_MAT_RCV_IZ S4 ON S3.SAP_MAT_CD = S4.SAP_MAT_CD AND S4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE S1.PD_CD = #{pdCd} /*VO에 들어온 상품코드 EX) EP01100317'*/ AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT T1.LGST_SPP_MTHD_CD AS SPP_MTHD_TP_CD /*배송방식유형코드*/ , T1.SAP_PLNT_CD /*SAP플랜트코드*/ , T2.SAP_SAVE_LCT_CD /*SAP저장위치코드*/ , T1.LGST_ITM_GD_CD /*물류품목등급코드 -14일이나반품건이나 폐기건 찾는건데.. 입출금에서 못줄꺼 대비*/ , COUNT(1) AS CNT /*이게 0보다 크면 수불여부 Y 조회되지 않거나 0이면 N*/ FROM TB_IFIN_OSTR_AK_DTL_SEND_ETXT T1 , TB_IFIN_ITM_OSTR_AK_SEND_ETXT T2 WHERE T1.LGST_OSTR_AK_NO = T2.LGST_OSTR_AK_NO AND T1.SAP_PLNT_CD = T2.SAP_PLNT_CD AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} GROUP BY T1.LGST_SPP_MTHD_CD /*배송방식유형코드*/ , T1.SAP_PLNT_CD /*SAP플랜트코드*/ , T2.SAP_SAVE_LCT_CD /*SAP저장위치코드*/ , T1.LGST_ITM_GD_CD

SELECT MAX(SLP_MAPNG_CDV) AS SLP_MAPNG_CDV FROM TB_CBCL_SLP_BASE_INF_BAS WHERE SLP_BASE_CDV = 'SAP_SL_TP_CD' AND SAP_BZ_TERY_CD = '1210' AND CNDT_VARB_NM1 = #{sellTpDtlCd} /*판매유형코드*/ AND CNDT_VARB_NM2 = #{clssVal} /*평가클래스*/ AND CNDT_VARB_NM3 = #{slTpDvCd} /*매출유형구분*/ AND CNDT_VARB_NM4 = #{addCondition} /*추가조건*/
